entry.name: Word - General
entry.description: A general word with only a type attribute. Word types include: noun, verb and article

entry.name: Word - Noun
entry.description: A word of type noun with case and lemma attributes

entry.name: Word - Participle
entry.description: A participle with case, lemma, mode, number and time attributes

entry.name: Word - Verb
entry.description: A verb with case, lemma, mode, number and time attributes

entry.name: Additional Name
entry.description: An additional name of a person

entry.name: Name without Reference
entry.description: Any word or construction that is also a name
